name: Cybernetic Overload
description:
This game is an old school, arcade style little shooter. 

Survive all enemy waves and destroy as many of them as you can.
You have only one life so be careful.

Some controls:

  • Aim with mouse 
  • LMB - Fire Lasers
  • RMB - Fire Rockets
  • Spacebar - Fire Flak Cannon
  • Z/W - Drop Bomb
  • X - Second Turret
  • C - Shield
